exec: pm.test("Response is JSON and contains created process group", function () {
pm.test("Response is JSON and contains created reporting task", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "disconnectedNodeAcknowledged": false,
    "reportingTaskSnapshot": {
        "reportingTasks": [
            {
                "name": "ComponentPrometheusReportingTask",
                "type": "org.qubership.nifi.reporting.ComponentPrometheusReportingTask",
                "bundle": {
                    "group": "org.qubership.nifi",
                    "artifact": "migration-nifi-processors-open",
                    "version": "2.0.0"
                },
                "scheduledState": "RUNNING",
                "schedulingPeriod": "30 secs",
                "schedulingStrategy": "TIMER_DRIVEN",
                "defaultSchedulingPeriod": {
                    "TIMER_DRIVEN": "0 sec",
                    "CRON_DRIVEN": "* * * * * ?"
                },
                "properties": {
                    "port": "9192",
                    "processor-time-threshold": "150 sec",
                    "connection-queue-threshold": "80",
                    "pg-level-threshold": "2"
                },
                "propertyDescriptors": {
                    "port": {
                        "name": "port",
                        "displayName": "Server Port",
                        "description": "",
                        "defaultValue": "9192",
                        "required": true,
                        "sensitive": false,
                        "dynamic": false,
                        "supportsEl": false,
                        "expressionLanguageScope": "Not Supported",
                        "dependencies": []
                    },
                    "processor-time-threshold": {
                        "name": "processor-time-threshold",
                        "displayName": "Processor time threshold",
                        "description": "Minimal processing time for processor to be included in monitoring.\nLimits data volume collected in Prometheus.",
                        "defaultValue": "150 sec",
                        "required": true,
                        "sensitive": false,
                        "dynamic": false,
                        "supportsEl": false,
                        "expressionLanguageScope": "Not Supported",
                        "dependencies": []
                    },
                    "connection-queue-threshold": {
                        "name": "connection-queue-threshold",
                        "displayName": "Connection queue threshold",
                        "description": "Minimal connection usage % relative to backPressureObjectThreshold.\nLimits data volume collected in Prometheus.",
                        "defaultValue": "80",
                        "required": true,
                        "sensitive": false,
                        "dynamic": false,
                        "supportsEl": false,
                        "expressionLanguageScope": "Not Supported",
                        "dependencies": []
                    },
                    "pg-level-threshold": {
                        "name": "pg-level-threshold",
                        "displayName": "Process group level threshold",
                        "description": "Maximum depth of process group to report in monitoring.\nLimits data volume collected in Prometheus.",
                        "defaultValue": "2",
                        "required": true,
                        "sensitive": false,
                        "dynamic": false,
                        "supportsEl": false,
                        "expressionLanguageScope": "Not Supported",
                        "dependencies": []
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
